Detailed Description

Waiter is a class to manage thread syncronization.

Member Function Documentation

void Waiter::notify (  void   ) 
 

Make a waiting thread awake

int Waiter::timedwait (  long  millisecond  ) 
 

Make the calling thread waiting. This thread will be awaked when an other thread call notify() or if millisecond time is up.

Parameters:
millisecond contains a value in millisecond for the timeout
Returns:
0 if a notify() occurs before millisecond, 1 else

void Waiter::wait (  void   ) 
 

Make the calling thread waiting. This thread will be awaked when an other thread call notify()

See also:
notify()
